phrase.item: For all the people around the world, I wish [you all] a happy New Year,
From old to young, I wish [you all] a happy New Year.
From God my wish is happiness and peace.
To each family individually, I wish them a happy New Year.
Because the beginning of spring is coming, this world will become all flowers [a garden].
To the people of the roof of the world, I wish you a happy New Year.
For all the sickness and disaster, may Mawlo make all happiness,
I wish you all happy New Year.
I asked the nightingale, [why] are you wailing?
It said, for you lovers, I wish a happy New Year.
Father, mother, sister and brother, gardener and the earth,
Dilbar of the region of Wakhan, I wish you a happy New Year.
Sanginmurod, you told everyone congratulations in Wakhi,
[But] for you a pencil says, hey young [man], I wish you a happy New Year.
